The Deadman's cape is a cosmetic cape that can be bought from Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 160 Last Man Standing points. It is part of the Deadman armour set.

In Deadman Mode, it is purchased from Nigel for one blood money and may be reclaimed for free. In order to purchase deadman armour in Deadman Mode, players must use the blood money on Nigel, instead of speaking to him, as there are no dialogue options for purchasing the armour.

The '''Deadman's cape''' is a cosmetic [[cape]] that can be bought from [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing]] for 160 [[Last Man Standing]] points. It is part of the [[Deadman armour]] set.

In [[Deadman Mode]], it is purchased from [[Nigel]] for one [[blood money]] and may be reclaimed for free. In order to purchase [[deadman armour]] in Deadman Mode, players must use the blood money on Nigel, instead of speaking to him, as there are no dialogue options for purchasing the armour.
